TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EndpointAddress10 extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Docs.summary: Provides a serializable type of endpoint address that is WS-Addressing V1 compliant and that enables it to be exposed as part of the service contract.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not serializable nor is it tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification. This class provides a WS-Addressing V1 compliant wrapper for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that is serializable (implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface) and bound to the WS-Addressing V1 wire format. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29> method does the wrapping and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.ToEndpointAddress%2A> method does the unwrapping, allowing the recovery of the endpoint address after it is serialized on the wire.
Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) also supplies a class that provides a serializable type, <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004>, which is WS-Addressing August 2004 compliant for legacy purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is required by the serialization contract. It must be public to be seen by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>. It is not intended to be called by developers.
